name: Sriracha Honey Brussels Sprouts
author: Bites of Flavor
summary: Healthy and full of flavor, sriracha honey Brussels sprouts are crispy and coated with a delicious sweet and spicy sauce. Perfect side dish for any meal! Top with a drizzle of sriracha sauce if desired.
ingredients: 1 pound Brussels sprouts, trimmed and cut in half
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spray a rimmed baking sheet with cooking spray
Combine Brussels sprouts, olive oil, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes in a bowl; toss until coated
Arrange in a single layer on prepared baking sheet
Roast in the preheated oven until Brussels sprouts are golden brown and tender, about 25 minutes
Mix honey and Sriracha sauce together in a small bowl until combined
Place roasted Brussels sprouts in a bowl
Drizzle with honey mixture; toss until well coated
